alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 01 at 6:46AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Advisory is in effect... WHAT...High Surfs of 10 to 12 feet WHERE...South shores of all Islands of American Samoa. WHEN...Through Thursday. IMPACTS...Minor. Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebreak, and strong longshore and rip currents making water recreation difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 645 TAEAO ASO LULU FEPUARI 1 2023 ...Ua iai nei le Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... MAFUAAGA...O galu maualuluga e 10 i le 12 futu NOFOAGA...O talafatai i saute o motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...se`ia oo i Aso Tofi. AAFIAGA...O galu malolosi ma maualuluga, o le aave o le sami, ma sologa i matafaga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gataifale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aave o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Ona o le siisii o peau o le sami, e fautuaina ai le mamalu lautele ma le au fai faiva ina ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga ona o le maualuluga o galu ua iai nei.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by safety officials and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
